A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved this movie and think it might be the strongest film in the Star Wars saga\, even though my feels tell me it can't be #1 because I still remember watching the twin suns of Tatooine rise as a child. 

For my money\, this might be the best made movie of the series because it introduced an expansive new cast\, dug deep into the real conflict of Rey and Kylo Ren\, answered questions\, left mysteries\, and made the most mature attempt to deal with themes of light and dark of any movie in the franchise. 

Loved it. Seeing it again.
